channel.title: programming on Rohit Goswami
channel.description: Recent content in programming on Rohit Goswami

item.title: Replacing Jupyter with Orgmode
item.description: Background I dislike Jupyter notebooks (and JupyterHub) a lot EIN is really not much of a solution either In the past I have written some posts on TeX with JupyterHub and discussed ways to use virtual Python with JupyterHub in a more reasonable manner. However, I personally found that EIN was a huge pain to work with, and I mostly ended up working with the web-interface anyway.

item.title: Poetry and Direnv
item.description: Background I end up writing about using poetry a lot I almost always use direnv in real life too I don’t keep writing mini scripts in my .envrc Honestly there’s nothing here anyone using the direnv wiki will find surprising, but then it is still neat to link back to. Setting Up Poetry This essentially works by simply modifying the global .direnvrc which essentially gets sourced by every local .
